params.text: Baaba wange omuwala muwanvu okusinga baaba wange omulenzi.
Oh lindako! Akabwa kaffe ka Jojo kaakali.
Ndi mupi okusinga baaba wange omulenzi.
Baaba wange omulenzi mumpi okusinga baaba wange omuwala.
Baaba wange omuwala mumpi okusinga Ma.
Wow! Pa y’asinga obuwanvu, ate jjo y’esinga obumpi.

"Muwanvu era Mumpi" credits

This work, “Muwanvu era Mumpi”, is a derivative of “Ubude nobufushane.” as translated by Celia Bolam used under CC BY.  The © for this translation lies with Room to Read, 2015. It is based on the original story: 'ខ្ពស់និងទាប', by Huy Chheng Rattana. © Room to Read, 2015. Some changes were made to this work.

“Muwanvu era Mumpi” is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.


Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza
